When an ally attacks an enemy with Rainbow Coverage, also gains 5 Rage

details.limit: Normal Skill also steals <color=#ffc13b>40%</color> of the target's Attack before dealing damage, lasts <color=#ffc13b>1</color> round. Stolen Attack cannot exceed <color=#ffc13b>200%</color> of self's Attack, also recovers <color=#ffc13b>50%</color> of self's already lost HP. The first time self receives fatal damage, Attack increases <color=#ffc13b>30%</color>, and recovers <color=#ffc13b>10</color> Rage after any Skill is released, lasts until the end of the battle.

Whip of Enticement.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage.
Lv.3: Also <font color=#FFC13B>Silences</font> the target for 2 round(s).

Sweet Lash.desc: Attacks all enemies, dealing 250% Attack Damage to each and reducing their Rage by 20

Binding Pursuit.desc: Normal Skill causes Drive-back, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Driven-back enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage.

Cute Rabbit Girl.desc: When Super S is attacked, there's a 40% chance to reduce the Defense of the attacker by 15% until the round ends
Lv.3: Also decreases the Rage of the attacker by 10

Fatal Seduction.desc: At the start of every 2 rounds, if self is not under Control, there's a 50% Chance to randomly <font color=#FFC13B>Paralyze</font> an enemy for 2 rounds
Once <font color=#FFC13B>Paralysis</font> wears off, also reduces damage dealt by the target by 15% for 1 round(s)
Damage reduction effect now lasts 2 round(s)

details.limit: Enemies attacked by Super S have the effects of Shields they gain reduced by <color=#ffc13b>50%</color>, lasts <color=#ffc13b>1</color> round. When allies in the same column as Super S are attacked, also triggers Cute Rabbit Girl effect.

Wildhorn Crash.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage.
Lv.3: Normal Skill also has a 50% chance to <font color=#FFC13B>Stun</font> the target. Lasts 1 rounds

Wildhorn Spike.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 500% Attack Damage.

Wildhorn Smite.desc: Normal Skill causes Drive-back, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Driven-back enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage.

Wildhorn Power.desc: Wildhorn's attacks also increases damage received by the target by 10% for 2 round(s), effect does not stack.
Lv.2: Damage received increase rises to 20%
Lv.3: When Wildhorn makes any attack, recovers 10% of already lost HP

Metal Armor.desc: When Wildhorn's HP is above 60%, damage received decreases by 40%
Damage reduction activation requirement changes to when HP is above 50%
When self's HP falls below 50% for the first time, gains 1 stack of Defense, which grants immunity to 1 Skill attack.

details.limit: Wildhorn Spike's target changes to the enemy with the highest Defense and reduces their Defense by <color=#ffc13b>100%</color> before dealing damage, lasts <color=#ffc13b>2</color> rounds. Each single set of damage received by Wildhorn will not exceed <color=#ffc13b>45%</color> of Max HP.

Bamboo Leaf Slash.desc: Attacks the enemy with the lowest HP percentage to cause 120% Attack Damage

Bamboo Forest Cleaver.desc: Attacks the enemy with the lowest HP percentage to cause 500% Attack Damage, if the target's HP is below 40% when attacking, damage dealt is multiplied by 3
Lv.2: When releasing Bamboo Forest Cleaver, self temporarily gains 50% Lifesteal
Lv.3: When self's HP is below 40%, Bamboo Forest Cleaver no longer needs to meet triggering conditions to trigger multiplied damage

Falling Leaf Slash.desc: Normal Skill causes Levitate, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Levitating enemy, dealing 120% Attack Damage.

Bamboo Forest Realm.desc: When round begins, Atomic Samurai causes self and allies in the same column to gain 20% Attack and 10% damage dealt bonuses until the round ends
Lv.2: Attack bonus gained increases to 30%, damage dealt bonus increases to 20%
Lv.3: When Atomic Samurai has Bamboo Forest Realm bonuses, all Skills deal 100% additional Attack Damage.

Bamboo Shadow.desc: When self's total damage received reaches 50% of HP, gains 1 round of <font color=#FFC13B>Unyielding</font>.
When gaining <font color=#FFC13B>Unyielding</font>, dispels all of self's control effects
During <font color=#FFC13B>Unyielding</font>, self gains <font color=#FFC13B>Control Immunity</font>
When Atomic Samurai enters <font color=#FFC13B>Unyielding</font>, increases Rage by 40

details.limit: After Atomic Samurai defeats an enemy, all allies receive a Shield equal to <color=#ffc13b>200%</color> of Atomic Samurai's Attack and all enemies become <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090013 h=0>Paralyzed</material></color> for <color=#ffc13b>1</color> round. When battle begins, Rage required to release Bamboo Forest Cleaver decreases <color=#ffc13b>20</color>, when releasing it again, the Rage requirements decrease by another <color=#ffc13b>20</color>, reducing it to <color=#ffc13b>60</color> at most.

Dual Blade Slash.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 120% Attack Damage.
Lv.2: Skill also causes enemy's Attack to decrease by 30% for 2 round(s)

Jet Arrow.desc: Attacks the column of the enemy with the lowest HP percentage, dealing 300% Attack Damage to each enemy, for every target hit, self gains a Shield equal to 20% of Max HP

High Voltage Fist.desc: Normal Skill causes Drive-back, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Driven-back enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage.

Turbine Core.desc: High Voltage Fist also increases the Attack of allies in the same row by 20% of Genos'Attack for 1 round
Lv.2: Attack bonus increases to 35% of Genos'Attack
Lv.3: Also grants allies in the same row 10 Rage

Fire Support.desc: When self is placed in the back 2 rows and is still alive, damage received by allies in the front row is decreased 10%
When self is placed in the back 2 rows and is still alive, also increases damage dealt by allies in the same row by 15%

details.limit: When round begins, for every 1 ally that has not been defeated, increases the Attack of all allies by <color=#ffc13b>5%</color> of Genos'Attack, their Defense by <color=#ffc13b>8%</color> of Genos'Defense and their Critical Chance by <color=#ffc13b>8%</color>, lasts until the round ends.

Palm Bell Fist.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage, if its a Critical Hit, additionally grants self a Shield equal to 100% of Attack.

Palm Bell Combo.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 500% Attack Damage, if it's a Critical Hit, additionally deals the target 100% Attack Damage.

Palm Bell Kick.desc: Normal Skill causes Levitate, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Levitating enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage, if it's a Critical Hit, <font color=#FFC13B>Silences</font> the target, lasts 2 round.

Martial Arts Damsel.desc: Before dealing damage each time, decreases the target's Critical Resistance by 30% for 1 round(s), effect does not stack.
Lv.2: Critical Resistance reduction increases to 50%
Lv.3: Before dealing damage each time, decreases the target's Defense by 30% for 1 round, effect does not stack.

Hair Bells.desc: When self's HP is above 50%, Attack increases 20%, when accumulated damage received reaches 50% of HP, Attack bonus disappears and Attack decreases 20%, lasts 1 round.
When self's HP is above 50%, Damage dealt increases 20%, when accumulated damage received reaches 50% of HP, Attack bonus disappears
When self's accumulated damage received reaches 50% of HP, Attack no longer decreases

details.limit: When enemies attacked by Ring-Ring use a skill that deals damage to more than <color=#ffc13b>2</color> targets in a single attack, damage dealt decreases <color=#ffc13b>40%</color> for <color=#ffc13b>1</color> rounds, this effect does not stack. If the enemy attacked by Ring-Ring has more than <color=#ffc13b>50%</color> HP, Ring-Ring temporarily increases Critical Chance by <color=#ffc13b>50%</color> and Critical Damage by <color=#ffc13b>100%</color>.

Techno Attack.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 100% Attack Damage and healing self and the ally with the lowest HP percentage by amount equal to 100% of Attack.
Lv.3: Recovered HP increases to 200% of Attack.

Shake Show.desc: Attacks all enemies, dealing 200% Attack Damage to each of them. Also decreases the damage they deal by 30%, lasts until the round ends. During this effect, when any enemy releases an Active Skill, all allies receive a Shield equal to 200% of Attack.

Vibrating Sound Wave.desc: Normal Skill causes Knock-down, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Knocked-down enemy, dealing 120% Attack Damage.

Soul Performer.desc: The first time King receives fatal damage, he dispels all control effects and recovers 40% of Max HP, afterwards he becomes untargetable until the round ends.

Lv.2: After exiting untargetable status, his current HP is recorded. When the next round ends, if his current HP is lower than the one recorded, his HP is restored back to the recorded HP. The amount of HP restored will not exceed 600% of King's Attack
Lv.3: Recovered HP increases to 60% Max HP

Rhythm Central.desc: Techno Attack also causes King and the ally with the lowest HP percentage to recover 10% of King's Max HP just before they use a Normal Skill, lasts 1 round.
Techno Attack also causes King to share 30% of the damage received by the ally with the lowest HP percentage until the round ends
Recovery effect increases to 20% of Max HP
The number of allies targeted by Techno Attack increases to 2

details.limit: After releasing Techno Attack, self receives <color=#ffc13b>40%</color> less damage until the round ends. Shake Show's duration increases to <color=#ffc13b>2</color> rounds. When battle starts, additionally releases one Shake Show which does not deal damage.

Thunder Punch.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 220% Attack Damage.
Lv.3: Also steals 10 of the target's Rage

Armageddon Lightning.desc: Consecutively attacks random enemies 10 times and deals 100% Attack Damage each time.

Thunder Knee.desc: Normal Skill causes Levitate, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Levitating enemy, dealing 180% Attack Damage.

Lightning Intrusion.desc: All of Boros'Attacks inflict 1 stack of Lightning Intrusion, each stack reduces the target's healing received effects to decrease 20% and lifesteal to decrease 20%, lasts 1 round
Lv.2: If the target attacked by Boros has 4 or more stacks of Lightning Intrusion, <font color=#FFC13B>Paralyzes</font> them for 2 round
Lv.3: Lightning Intrusion duration increases to 2 rounds

Lightning Bomb.desc: Armageddon Lightning's attack also inflicts 1 Lightning Bomb on the target, dealing them 50% Attack damage each round. If the attacked target already has a Lightning Bomb, its damage is triggered in advanced.
When Lightning Bomb is triggered, deals damage equal to 5% of Max HP to the target, this damage will not exceed 100% of Boros'Attack
When Old World characters receive damage from non Old World characters, the damage is reduced 15%

details.limit: Each time Armageddon Lightning is released, the next time it's released it deals <color=#ffc13b>30%</color> more Attack damage, lasts until the battle ends, damage increases <color=#ffc13b>2</color> times at most, Armageddon Lightning's attack times additionally increases by <color=#ffc13b>10</color> times. Each time Lightning Bomb is released in advanced, Boros additionally recovers <color=#ffc13b>4</color> Rage.

Spirit Blow.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 200% Attack Damage and reduces target's Attack by 20% for 1 round(s).

Arrow of Confusion.desc: Attacks all enemies, dealing 400% Attack Damage to each of them with a 40% Chance to <font color=#FFC13B>Confuse</font> the target for 1 round(s).

Psychedelic Tornado.desc: Normal Skill causes Drive-back, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Driven-back enemy, dealing 180% Attack Damage and reducing the target's Attack by 20% for 1 rounds.

Eyed Mark.desc: When entering battle, chooses the enemy with the highest Attack and increases the damage they receive by 30% for 2 round(s).
Lv.2: Damage received increase effect raises to 40%
Lv.3: Damage received increase effect raises to 50%

Sweet Prisoner.desc: Spirit Blow and Psychedelic Tornado also decreases the Defense of the target before they take damage by 30% and lasts 1round(s)
Spirit Blow and Psychedelic Tornado's Attack decrease effect increases to 35%
Chance of <font color=#FFC13B>Confusion</font> effect caused by Arrow of Confusion increases to 100%
When Old World characters receive damage from non Old World characters, the damage is reduced 15%

details.limit: When Hellish Blizzard is on the battle field, all enemies deal <color=#ffc13b>40%</color> less damage. Quick Combo Strike.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 120% Attack Damage and inflicting <font color=#FFC13B>Burn</font>, dealing 60% Attack Damage per round for 2 round(s).

Show On Fire.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 500% Attack Damage and inflicting 3 stacks of <font color=#FFC13B>Burn</font>, dealing 60% Attack Damage per round for 2 round(s). If the target gets defeated, all other enemies receive 1 stack of <font color=#FFC13B>Burn</font> each.

Sparkling Elbow Jab.desc: Normal Skill causes Drive-back, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Driven-back enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage and inflicting <font color=#FFC13B>Burn</font>, dealing 60% Attack Damage per round for 2 rounds.

Party Animal.desc: When a round begins, if self is not under a control effect, inflicts all enemies with 1 stack of <font color=#FFC13B>Burn</font>, dealing 60% Attack Damage per round for 2 round.
Lv.2: If the target Garou is attacking has <font color=#FFC13B>Burn</font>, his Critical Chance temporarily increases by 40% when attacking, effect does not stack.
Lv.3: If the target Garou is attacking has <font color=#FFC13B>Burn</font>, his damage temporarily increases by 30% when attacking, effect does not stack.

Super Star.desc: After releasing Party Animal, if the enemy has over 10 stacks of <font color=#FFC13B>Burn</font>, self recovers 30% of already lost HP and enters Super Star mode until the round ends, during this mode, Attack increases 30%.
During Super Star mode, Critical Chance increase by 30%
During Super Star mode, Critical Damage increases by 50%
During Super Star, self gains <font color=#FFC13B>Control Immunity</font>

details.limit: Each time accumulated damage received reaches <color=#ffc13b>20%</color> of HP, Attack increases by <color=#ffc13b>15%</color>, triggers <color=#ffc13b>10</color> times at most, lasts until the battle ends. If Garou's target has <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090002 h=0>Burn</material></color>, the other enemies around the target also receive 1 stack of <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090002 h=0>Burn</material></color>, Party Animal also causes targets already with <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090002 h=0>Burn</material></color> effects to additionally trigger <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090002 h=0>Burn</material></color> damage.

Flow Shock.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 200% Attack Damage.

Bathysmal Chains.desc: Selects the confronting enemy and the enemy with the greatest strength (besides the 1st target) and deals 300% Attack damage to each of them, also inflicts the 2 targets with the Bathysmal Chains state until the round ends. When any target with this state receives damage, other targets with this state also receive 100% of that damage. If there's only 1 enemy target, this skill cannot be released.

Wave Spew.desc: Normal Skill causes Levitate, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Levitating enemy, dealing 180% Attack Damage.

Marine Armor.desc: If Deep Sea King takes damage that is lower than 20% of self's HP, adds a shield equal to 50% of this damage.
Lv.2: If Deep Sea King takes damage that is lower than 25% of self's HP, adds a shield equal to 60% of this damage.
Lv.3: If Deep Sea King takes damage that is lower than 30% of self's HP, adds a shield equal to 70% of this damage.

Bathysmal Stamp.desc: Deep Sea King's Normal Skill inflicts a Bathysmal Stamp on the target, reducing the target's Attack by 20%, this effect lasts until Deep Sea King is attacked.
Bathysmal Stamp also reduces target's Critical Chance by 20%

Before it deals damage, Deep Sea King's Normal Skill also removes the target's shields and most of their buffs
When Old World characters receive damage from non Old World characters, the damage is reduced 15%

details.limit: Before Bathysmal Stamp reduces the target's Attack, it also increases self's Attack by <color=#ffc13b>50%</color> of the target's Attack, this effect lasts until the target is defeated and will not trigger again. Bathysmal Chains will additionally select the enemy with the lowest HP percentage, not including the original 2 targets. When a target with this effect is inflicted with a debuff, Bathysmal Chains also causes other targets with Bathysmal Chains to receive the same effect.

Soft Doggie Punch.desc: Attacks the target with the highest strength, dealing 220% Attack Damage and inflicting them with <font color=#FFC13B>Sleep</font> for 2 round.

Soft Doggie Combo.desc: Attacks the target with the highest strength and their row, dealing 400% Attack Damage to each target and inflicting them with <font color=#FFC13B>Sleep</font> for 2 round.

Soft Doggie Pounce.desc: Normal Skill causes Knock-down, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Knocked-down enemy, dealing 200% Attack Damage and inflicting the target with <font color=#FFC13B>Sleep</font> for 2 rounds.

Quick Nap.desc: From the start of round 1, enters Nap state every 1 round(s), during this time, self cannot be attacked and has <font color=#FFC13B>Control Immunity</font> until the end of the round. When exiting Nap state, recovers 30% Max HP.
Lv.2: When in Nap state, self's Rage regeneration increases 50%
Lv.3: Recovered HP increases to 60% of Max HP

Deadly Trap.desc: If Watchdog Man's target has <font color=#FFC13B>Sleep</font>, before dealing damage, reduces the target's Defense by 30% for 1 round
Before entering Nap state, Watchdog Man gains 40% Damage Reflection
Before entering Nap state, Watchdog Man gains <font color=#FFC13B>Taunt</font>
After entering Nap state, Watchdog Man accumulates all the damage he receives, when attacking in the next round, he additionally deals the damage received while in Nap state.
When Old World characters receive damage from non Old World characters, the damage is reduced 15%

details.limit: When in a Nap, Watchdog Man's self's Rage regeneration effect increases to <color=#ffc13b>100%</color> and he cannot be attacked. When leaving the Nap state, Watchdog Man increases his Attack by <color=#ffc13b>50%</color> until the round ends.

Current Slash.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 120% Attack Damage.

Wave Slash.desc: Attacks the column of the confronting enemy, deals 300% Attack Damage to the first enemy, afterwards, ignores the Defense of the remaining targets, and with each target hit, Attack Damage increases by 100%.

Flow Mark.desc: Normal Skill causes Knock-down, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Knocked-down enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage.

Dynamic Form.desc: Each time Normal Skill is used, enters Dynamic Form. Dynamic Form causes the next Attack Damage received to be reduced by 50% after which Dynamic Form disappears.

Desert Mirage.desc: At the start of every 2 rounds, if self does not have a Control Effect, enters Desert Mirage state, during which self cannot be selected as a target. As soon as self releases a skill, the state ends.
After Sonic exits Desert Mirage, damage dealt increases by 50%, effect disappears after releasing a Skill.
The first skill released after exiting Desert Mirage <font color=#FFC13B>Stuns</font> the target for 1 round

details.limit: When Sonic exits Desert Mirage state he also gains <color=#ffc13b>55%</color> Lifesteal, this effect dispels after he releases his next Skill. Dynamic effect dispels only after triggering <color=#ffc13b>2</color> times.

Surge Wave.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 120% Attack Damage.

Telekinetic Amplification.desc: Releases a Telekinesis Amplification on the ally with the highest strength (does not include self) and who has not yet received Telekinesis Amplification, increasing the damage they deal by 30% and reducing the damage they receive by 30%, lasts 2 rounds. When releasing, also heals targets that already have Telekinesis Amplification with HP equal to 200% of Attack, Telekinesis Amplification cannot be dispelled.
Lv.2: Telekinesis Amplification also grants the target 50% Lifesteal and a 50% Critical Chance bonus
Lv.3: Damage increase effect increases to 50%, damage received reduction effect increases to 50%

Shock Wave.desc: Normal Skill causes Levitate, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Levitating enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage, and grants self a Shield equal to 100% of Attack

Lv.2: Water Elemental's Attack Damage increases to 150%, Shield power increases to 150%
Lv.3: Each time a rounds ends, if the Water Elemental has not yet been defeated, increases its attack by 10% and Defense by 10% until the battle ends.

Telekinesis Enhancement.desc: When Terrible Tornado is in battle, shields received by allies increase their power by 40%
Water Elemental's attack also causes Levitate, and has a 50% chance to chase and hit a Levitating enemy, dealing 150% Attack Damage.
Water Elemental's Normal Skill also causes targets to recover 50% less Rage, lasts 1 round
When Water Elemental is summoned, it gains a Telekinesis Amplification effect

details.limit: When the battle begins, additionally releases one Telekinesis Amplification and the duration of Telekinesis Amplification changes to until the battle ends. When the round begins, if Tornado hasn't been defeated, targets with Telekinesis Amplification gain a Shield equal to <color=#ffc13b>200%</color> of Tornado's Attack and gains <color=#ffc13b>10</color> Rage.

Slash of the Underworld God.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 160% Attack Damage and preventing the target from gaining rage, stealing 1 buff effect from the target, and inheriting the remaining duration of the effect.

Sword of the Underworld God.desc: Unable to use active skills., Normal Skill consumes 60 rage, Normal Skill now targets the row of the enemy being confronted, and deals 300% additional Attack Damage.

Pursuit of the Underworld God.desc: Normal Skill causes Levitate, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Levitating enemy, dealing 180% Attack Damage.

Vessel of the Underworld God.desc: Flashy Flash will not die if he takes a fatal hit, and he will gain the <font color=#FFC13B></font>Unyielding effect for 1 round. This effect can be re-acquired again upon defeating any target.
Lv2.<font color=#FFC13B> During Unyielding</font>, self Lifesteal effect increases to 20%.
Lv3.<font color=#FFC13B> During Unyielding</font>, self Lifesteal effect increases to 40%.

Suppression of the Underworld God.desc: When gaining <font color=#FFC13B>Unyielding</font>, dispels all of self's control effects
Slash of the Underworld God Skill, increases the number of buffs that can be stolen to 2.
When Old World characters receive damage from non Old World characters, the damage is reduced 15%

details.limit: Slash of the Underworld God has a <color=#ffc13b>50%</color>chance to release 1 more time, but no rage will be gained. Sword of the Underworld God has a reduced rage cost of <color=#ffc13b>50</color>. When entering battle, reduces all enemies' rages by 20.

Food Coma.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 90% Attack Damage. There is a 50% chance to cause <font color=#FFC13B>Sleep</font>. Lasts 2 round(s).

Food Invasion.desc: Attacks all enemies, dealing 200% Attack Damage to each enemy, before dealing damage reduces target's Defense by 30% for 2 rounds.

Food Chase.desc: Normal Skill causes Knock-down, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Knocked-down enemy, dealing 100% Attack Damage, there's a 50% Chance to inflict the target with <font color=#FFC13B>Sleep</font> for 2 rounds.

Desert Gal.desc: When Hellish Blizzard releases any skill, the ally with the lowest HP percentage recovers HP equal to 100% of Hellish Blizzard's Attack.
Lv.2: Recovered HP increases to 150% of Hellish Blizzard's Attack.
Lv.3: If the healing overflows, a portion of the overflown healing will turn into a shield

Sweet Slumberland.desc: When entering battle, selects all enemies and inflicts them with a 40% chance to enter <font color=#FFC13B>Sleep</font> for 2 rounds.
Chance to cause <font color=#FFC13B>Sleep</font> increases to 55%
Chance to cause <font color=#FFC13B>Sleep</font> increases to 70%

If Hellish Blizzard's Normal Skill or Chase and Hit Skill attacks a target that already has <font color=#FFC13B>Sleep</font>, the target does not enter <font color=#FFC13B>Sleep</font> and instead becomes <font color=#FFC13B>Stunned</font> for 1 round

details.limit: After Hellish Blizzard inflicts any control effects on the target, increases damage received by the target by <color=#ffc13b>20%</color> for 2 rounds, effect does not stack. All enemies that receive Hellish Blizzard's attacks and become inflicted with control effects also grant her <color=#ffc13b>5</color> Rage.

Hi-Tech Gun.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 120% Attack Damage.

Hi-Tech Bomb.desc: Attacks all enemies, dealing 300% Attack Damage to each enemy.

Thunder Axe.desc: Normal Skill causes Knock-down, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Knocked-down enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage.

Function Enhancement.desc: When each round begins, self randomly enters an enhancement state. The blue enhancement state grants him a shield equal to 100% of Attack after he makes an attack. The red state increases his Attack by 30%. The purple state increases the target's damage received by 30% before Zombieman deals damage, lasts 1 round.
Lv.2: Blue enhancement state's shield increases to 150% of Attack
Lv.3 Red enhancement's Attack bonus increases to 50%

Upgrade Escalation.desc: Enhancement states gain additional effects. The blue state also grants the ally with the lowest HP percentage a shield. The red state also increases self's Critical Chance by 30%. The purple state also removes the target's shields before Zombieman deals damage.
Red enhancement's Critical Chance bonus increases to 50%
After enhancement state has been triggered 3 times, self enters the golden state which activates all effects until the battle ends.
The number of enhancement state triggers required to trigger the golden state is reduced to 2 times.

details.limit: Each time he enters enhanced mode, Zombieman dispels his control effects and recovers <color=#ffc13b>40%</color> Max HP. Rage required to release Hi-Tech Bomb decreases<color=#ffc13b>40</color> but the total damage it deals decreases <color=#ffc13b>20%</color>.

Psychokinesis Beam.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage and lowering the target's Defense by 30%. Lasts 2 rounds
Lv.4: Defense reduction inflicted on enemy increases to 50%

Psychic Storm.desc: Attacks all enemies, dealing 300% Attack Damage to each, if more than 2 targets are attacked, recovers all of self's HP.

Clone Ambush.desc: Normal Skill causes Knock-down, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Knocked-down enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage.

Call Clone.desc: When entering battle, consumes 50% HP to summon 2 Clones, each Clone adds 25% Lifesteal effect to Gyoro Gyoro's Attack, when Gyoro Gyoro receives fatal damage, consumes a Clone to recover 50% of Max HP.
Lv.2: Lifesteal effect granted by each Clone increases to 40%
Lv.3: Recovered HP increases to 80% of Max HP

Multi-Clone.desc: Each Clone causes Gyoro Gyoro to deal an additional 50% Attack Damage
When an enemy is defeated, if the number of Clones have not reached the limit, there is a 40% chance to add 1 Clone
Max number of Clones increases to 3

details.limit: When entering battle, increases the Defense of all allies by <color=#ffc13b>100%</color> of Gyoro Gyoro's Defense until the round ends. When entering battle, the HP consumed to Summon Clone decreases to <color=#ffc13b>25%</color>, and all enemies are <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090004 h=0>Silenced</material></color> until the round ends.

Notes Strike.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 200% Attack Damage.

Hero's Hymn: Motivation.desc: Increases the Attack of all allies by 50% of Child Emperor's Attack, lasts until the battle ends, and recovers all allies' HP equal to 300% of Attack.
Lv.2: When skill is used, additionally dispels the majority of ally Debuffs.
Lv.3: Recovered HP increases to 500% of Attack.

Notes Pursuit.desc: Normal Skill causes Drive-back, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Driven-back enemy, dealing 180% Attack Damage.

Hero's Hymn: Protection.desc: When entering battles, adds a shield equal to 200% of Child Emperor's Attack to all allies.
Lv.2: All ally healing received effects increases 50%, lasts until the battle ends

Lv.3 When entering battles, self enters a protective state, gains <font color=#FFC13B>Control Immunity</font>, does not take any damage, but is also unable to release any skills, lasts until the round ends.

Music Talent.desc: The lower the HP, the greater the damage reduction effect, increasing by up to 40% at most
The lower the HP, the greater the damage reduction effect, increasing by up to 80% at most
Hero's Hymn: Motivation also gives all allies <font color=#FFC13B>Unstoppable</font>.
Hero's Hymn: Motivation's duration is prolonged to the end of the next round.
When Old World characters receive damage from non Old World characters, the damage is reduced 15%

details.limit: When entering battle, increases the Max HP of all allies by <color=#ffc13b>30%</color>,  does not affect the current HP. Hero's Hymn: Motivation adds 1 layer of Defense effect to all allies, and negates one attack damage. At the beginning of the second round, additionally releases 1 Hero's Hymn: Motivation, and does not consume any Rage.

Ice Club Bash.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 120% Attack Damage and inflicting <font color=#FFC13B>Bleeding</font>, dealing 50% Attack Damage per round for 3 round(s).

Blizzard Critical Strike.desc: Attacks all enemies, dealing 350% Attack Damage to each enemy, if the target is already inflicted with <font color=#FFC13B>Bleeding</font> effect, the surrounding enemies will also suffer 1 stack of <font color=#FFC13B>Bleeding</font>.

Ice Club Boomerang.desc: Normal Skill causes Drive-back, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Driven-back enemy, dealing 120% Attack Damage with a chance to inflict <font color=#FFC13B>Bleeding</font>, dealing 50% Attack Damage per round, lasts 3 rounds

Snow Slides Ambush.desc: At the start of each round, ambushes the target with the highest Attack, dealing 120% Attack Damage, and inflicts <font color=#FFC13B>Bleeding</font>, dealing 50% Attack Damage per round, lasts 3 rounds.

Bone Chill.desc: Inflicts one stack of <font color=#FFC13B>Bleeding</font> effect if Bat's attacked targets have already been inflicted with <font color=#FFC13B>Bleeding</font>.
If Bat's attacked targets have already been inflicted with <font color=#FFC13B>Bleeding</font> effect, deals additional damage equal to 25% of target's Max HP, Cannot exceed 1500% of self's Attack.
When Bat is alive, all <font color=#FFC13B>Bleeding</font> effects inflicted by allies cannot be dispelled.
If the target Bat is attacking has <font color=#FFC13B>Bleeding</font>, this attack becomes a Critical Hit.

details.limit: While Bat is alive, all ally <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090015 h=0>Bleed</material></color> damage increases <color=#ffc13b>100%</color>. All of Bat's attacks additionally cause <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090015 h=0>Bleeding</material></color> effects to be triggered on targets who already have <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090015 h=0>Bleeding</material></color> effects. Whenever Bat's attack causes Critical Hits, it inflicts additional <color=#ffc13b>200%</color> attack damage equal to Bat's attack onto all enemies with <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090015 h=0>Bleeding</material></color> effect.

Mega Goldbrick.desc: Attacks 3 random enemies, dealing 50% Attack Damage to each enemy, this attack doesn't cause targets to recover Rage.

Deadly Luxury Goods.desc: Attacks all enemies, dealing 260% damage to each enemy, and recovers HP by 30% of damage inflicted.

Goldbrick Smash.desc: Normal Skill causes Knock-down, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Knocked-down enemy, dealing 100% Attack Damage.

Cash Defense.desc: After Tornado's attack, gives self a Shield equal to 80% Attack.
Lv.2: Added Shields increase to 90% of Attack
Lv3: Aside from self's Cash Defense, the allied target with the lowest HP also receives 1 shield of the same type.

Money Mark.desc: After being attacked by Tornado, targets are inflicted with Money Marks, and reducing the marked target's attack by 10% for 2 round, this effect cannot stack.
Money Mark takes effect for 3 round(s)
If Tornado's attack target is inflicted with Money Mark, then<font color=#FFC13B>silences</font> the target for 2 rounds.

details.limit: Tornado attacks the confronting enemy with Money Mark, causing additional <color=#ffc13b>120%</color> Attack Damage. The targets selected by Cash Defense will be granted <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090007 h=0>Control Immunity</material></color> for 1 rounds.

Fine Wine Guzzling.desc: Guzzling the wines, recovers HP equal to 200% of Attack, the overflown healing will turn into a shield.
Lv.2: Recovered HP increases to 220% of Attack.
Lv.3: Recovered HP increases to 240% of Attack.
Lv.4: Recovered HP increases to 260% of Attack.
Lv.5: Recovered HP increases to 280% of Attack.

Fine Wine Spree.desc: Attacks all enemies, dealing 300% Attack Damage to each, and causing 2 enemies with the highest attack to enter Drunkenness state, lasts for 2 rounds. If self receives damage, 50% of the damage will be transferred to targets with drunkeness.

Flagon Impact.desc: There is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Driven-back or Knocked-down enemy, dealing 200% Attack Damage. Each chase & hit state can trigger 1 time(s) per round

Impregnable Fortress.desc: When battle begins, if Pig God is deployed at the first row, increases the Attack of allies at the same column equal to 30% of Pig God's Attack attributes, lasts until the battle ends.
Lv2: increases the Defense of allies at the same column equal to 40% of Pig God's Defense attributes, lasts until the battle ends.
Lv3: Whenever there are 2 allies in the same column as Pig God, Pig God receives <font color=#FFC13B>Control Immunity</font>, lasts until the battle ends.

Wines of Fragrance.desc: The recovery effect of Fine Wine Guzzling will also be applied to the ally with the lowest HP percentage.
The recovery effect of Fine Wine Guzzling will also be applied to 2 allies with the lowest HP percentage.
Fine Wine Guzzling also grants Pig God with Unstoppable effect, lasts until the battle ends.
The recovery effect of Fine Wine Guzzling will be applied to all allies.
When Old World characters receive damage from non Old World characters, the damage is reduced 15%

details.limit: Drunkenness also causes targets to receive <color=#ffc13b>40%</color> more damage, and prevents targets to Parry or deal Critical Hits. When self receives damage, <color=#ffc13b>90% </color>damage received will transfer to enemies that are affected by Drunkenness.

Round Kick.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 120% Attack Damage that ignores the target's defense.
Lv.4: When Suiryu attacks, each dynamic mark reduces the target's Rage by 5.

Tempo Combo.desc: Attacks the target with the highest strength, dealing 300% Attack Damage that ignores the target's defense, and 250% splash damage that ignores defense to all surrounding enemies.
Lv.2: Increases the damage to the enemy with the highest strenght to 400%, and the splash damage to 300%.
Lv.3: Increases the damage to the enemy with the highest strenght to 500%, and the splash damage to 350%.

Ground Pound Kick.desc: Normal Skill causes Knock-down, there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Knocked-down enemy, dealing 120% Attack Damage that ignores the target's defense.

Elusive Figure.desc: Suiryu gains a permanent parry against all attack damage and is not affected by critical hits.
Lv.2: When successfully parrying an attack, recovers HP equal to 100% of Attack
Lv.2: When successfully parrying an attack, increases self's Critical Chance by 20%, until the end of the battle, effect stacks 10 times at most.

Flash Figure.desc: Each time a skill is released, self gains 1 Dynamic Mark. Each Dynamic Mark increases the self's Attack by 15%, 4 Marks can be acquired at most.
Each Dynamic Mark increases self's Critical Damage by 12%.
Each Dynamic Mark allows Suiryu to additionally recover 5 Rage after releasing a normal skill.
Self gains <font color=#FFC13B>Control Immunity</font> after accumulating 4 stacks of Dynamic Mark.

details.limit: When successfully parrying an attack, self gains a <color=#ffc13b>5%</color> damage increase, lasts until the battle ends, up to <color=#ffc13b>16</color> stacks, and adds a shield equal to <color=#ffc13b>100%</color> of Attack to all allies. After parrying an attack for the first time each round, gives 1 stack of Defense effect to allies (self excluded), making them immune to 1 Skill attack.

Sneak Slash.desc: Attacks the enemy with the lowest HP percentage, dealing <font color=#FFC13B>True Damage</font> equal to 140% of Attack.

Shadow Velocity.desc: Attacks the enemy with the lowest HP percentage, dealing <font color=#FFC13B>True Damage</font> equal to 500% of Attack.

Blink Blast.desc: Normal Skill causes Levitate, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Levitating enemy, dealing <font color=#FFC13B>True Damage</font> equal to 180% of Attack.

Trial of Fate.desc: Following an ally's attack, Sonic inflicts 1 stack of Mark of Fate on the target if self is not under any control effect; each stack of Mark of Fate increases the damage received by the target by 10%, effect stacks 5 times at most, until the end of the battle. This effect cannot be dispelled.
Lv2: Damage increase effect increases to 15%
Lv3: Damage increase effect increases to 20%

Where They Go, the Shadow Follows.desc: Following an ally's attack, Sonic dispels 1 random debuff on an ally if self is not under any control effect, and removes 1 random buff from the target.

Following an ally's attack, Sonic increases the Attack of allies equal to 10% of Attack for 1 round, effect stacks 5 times at most, and reduces the target's defense by 15% for 1 round, effect stacks 5 times at most.
The number of debuffs dispelled increases to 3, the number of buffs removed increases to 3.
Changed effect of Attack increase and reduction from 'lasts for x rounds' to 'until the battle ends'.
When Old World characters receive damage from non Old World characters, the damage is reduced 15%

details.limit: Following an ally's attack, Sonic will launch an additional attack to deal <color=#ffc13b>150%</color> <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090024 h=0>True Damage</material></color> if self is not under any Control Effect. When Sonic attacks a target with Mark of Fate, each stack of Mark of Fate allows Sonic to deal an additional <color=#ffc13b>50%</color> of <color=#FFC13B><material=underline c=#FFC13B n=tip p=6090024 h=0>True Damage</material></color> to the target.

Backpack Bang.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage. If self’s current chocolate count exceeds  ,  then attacks the confronting enemy's row instead.

Valentine's Day Rumble.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy's column, dealing 350% Attack Damage. If self's current chocolate count exceeds 2, dispels all buffs and shields on the targets before dealing damage.

Tackle Kick.desc: Normal Skill causes Knock-down, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Knocked-down enemy, dealing 110% Attack Damage. If self's current chocolate count exceeds 2, steals 10 Rage from the target.

Sweet Chocolate.desc: Each round, after an ally other than self acts, there's a 80% chance to grant Ring-Ring 1 chocolate, each chocolate increases Ring-Ring's Attack by 10%. When Ring-Ring launches normal attacks, she consumes her Chocolate, causing her to deal an additional 80% damage for each Chocolate consumed, up to 10 Chocolates can be consumed each time.
Lv.2: Attack bonus increases to 15%, Skill damage increases to 100%
Lv.3: Attack bonus increases to 20%, Skill damage increases to 120%

Love Mood.desc: Each chocolate owned by Ring-Ring has 10% chance to reduce the Rage of the target by 20 when attacks.
Chance to reduce Rage increases to 15%
Chance to reduce Rage increases to 25%
When battle begins, Ring-Ring gains 2 Chocolate

details.limit: Each Chocolate consumed by Ring-Ring increases self-damage done by <color=#ffc13b>5%</color>, lasts until the battle ends. Consume 8 chocolates to permanently increase self-attack by <color=#ffc13b>50%</color> for the duration of the battle, this effect cannot be dispelled. If Ring-Ring has at least 2 Chocolates at the end of the round, she will consume 2 Chocolates directly and release 1 additional Normal Skill.

Gold Smash.desc: Attacks the confronting enemy, dealing 100% Attack Damage; consumes 10% of self Max HP, dealing damage equal to 10% of the target's Max HP, cannot exceed 10% of Zombieman's Max HP.

Gold Combo.desc: Attacks all enemies, dealing 300% Attack Damage to each; consumes 20% HP, additionally dealing damage equal to 20% of the target's Max HP, cannot exceed 20% of Zombieman's Max HP.

Gold Hunt.desc: Normal Skill causes Drive-back, and there is a 50% chance to chase and hit a Driven-back enemy, dealing 120% Attack damage; consumes 10% of self Max HP, dealing damage equal to 10% of the target's Max HP, cannot exceed 10% of Zombieman's Max HP.

Gold Blast.desc: When Zombieman receives fatal damage, deals damage to all enemies equal to 30% of Zombieman's Max HP.
Lv.2: increases damage dealt equal to 40% of Zombieman's Max HP
Lv.3: increases damage dealt equal to 50% of Zombieman's Max HP

Heart of Gold.desc: When self's HP is lower than 60%%  for the first time, reduces all enemies' Defense by 50%, lasts for 2 rounds.
When self's HP is lower than 60%%  for the first time, reduces all enemies' Critical Resistance by 100%, lasts for 2 rounds.
When self's HP is lower than 60%%  for the first time, causes <font color=#FFC13B>Stun</font> on all enemies, lasts for 1 round.
When self's HP is lower than 60%%  for the first time, self gains <font color=#FFC13B>Taunt</font>.

details.limit: When Zombieman is alive, increases damage received by all enemies by <color=#ffc13b>40%</color>. The lower the self-HP, the greater the damage, this effect goes up to <color=#ffc13b>100%</color>. After releasing Gold Blast, all allies gain a shield equal to <color=#ffc13b>30%</color> of Zombieman's Max HP, and increases damage dealt by all allies by <color=#ffc13b>30%</color>, lasts until the battle ends. This effect can not be dispelled.
